name: The Chateau of the Falcons
description:
DESCRIPTION
Discover an unforgettable setting for a truly memorable event. In the stables - under a 6 meter high ceiling with exposed beams - we invite you to organise your wedding for up to 150 people.
The Château has survived through the ages and has been in existence for over 500 years. Generations have followed one another and left their traces on the chateau. Come and discover them and be a part of the history of this special place too. Its rural and intimate setting will guarantee your total relaxation.
The Gardens
The 4 and a half hectares surrounding the castle will delight everyone with their diversity. Stroll through the wooded park and admire the ancient moats and ponds that surround the property.
Contemplate for a moment the magnificent French-style garden and its fountain. Visit the henhouse and watch the animals in the meadow.
ACCOMMODATION
THE DOVECOTE
Today renovated and empty of its former inhabitants, ours is made up of 400 nests and is absolutely charming under its framework.
Relax in its king size bed and private jacuzzi, and enjoy an enchanted break in this romantic place for one night or more.
THE LODGE AND THE BARN
Live or relive the experience of the 50s in our 14 people lodge, Le Pensionnat. Or get cosy in the wooden cabins of our other 14 people lodge, La Grange.
